# Copilot Instructions

This file provides workspace-specific custom instructions for Copilot when working with this Python project.

## Project Overview

This is a Python project workspace configured for development, testing, and deployment.

## Key Guidelines

- Follow Python PEP 8 style guide
- Use type hints for functions and variables
- Include docstrings for modules, classes, and functions
- Write comprehensive unit tests
- Maintain clear project structure with separation of concerns
